add_library(external INTERFACE)

#vulkan libraries
set(VULKAN_HEADERS_INSTALL_DIR "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/external/Vulkan-Headers")
set(VOLK_STATIC_DEFINES VK_USE_PLATFORM_WIN32_KHR)
add_subdirectory(volk)
set(VK_BOOTSTRAP_VULKAN_HEADER_DIR "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/external/Vulkan-Headers/include")
set(VK_BOOTSTRAP_DISABLE_WARNINGS on)
add_subdirectory(vk-bootstrap)
add_subdirectory(VulkanMemoryAllocator)

#other libraries
add_subdirectory(glm)
add_subdirectory(tinyobjloader)
target_include_directories(external INTERFACE stb)

target_link_libraries(external INTERFACE  volk::volk vk-bootstrap::vk-bootstrap GPUOpen::VulkanMemoryAllocator
                                          glm::glm tinyobjloader)
